title: Paul A. Bennett: Books and Printing, A Treasury for Typophiles
content:
Hey everyone. I have an auction running for a wonderful book that I feel like it's time to pass on. Please take a look if you would like to read some terrific essays from the masters.

Excellent first edition.

[http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=110416895875](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417162308/http:/cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=110416895875 "http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=110416895875")
author: austin
